message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at $12,000. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider a price closer to $6,000.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but $6,000 is significantly below its value. I could be flexible, but I can't go lower than $10,000. This is my final offer.
